description: Brimming with Italian-inspired flavours and tasty chargrilled veg, this pasta salad will be a hit come dinner time.
keywords: Pasta salad,Pescatarian,Salad,Tree nut free,Spring,Low sugar,Nov 2020,Sesame free,Zucchini,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Leftover vegetable,Peanut free
name: Chargrilled Vegetable Pasta Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 medium zucchini, cut into thick diagonal slices
1 cup marinated artichoke hearts, drained, quartered
0.25 cup continental parsley leaves, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta according to packet instructions. Drain, refresh under cold water then set aside.
Meanwhile, heat a chargrill pan over medium-high heat. Cook zucchini for 2 minutes on each side or until charred and tender. Add to pasta with capsicum, artichoke, olives and rocket.
Whisk oil, vinegar and mustard until combined. Season. Top salad with dollops of ricotta, scatter over parsley and serve drizzled with dressing.
